channel.title: Barrage KO 317 100% pvp second release
channel.description:
[center]Okay first off this is only my second release.[/center] [center]Second off im only taking very few credits for this.[/center] [center]Third off this is a cammy-pvp base and i only recoded shops and interfaces.[/center] [center]OKAY GUYS ONCE AGAIN.. FULL D CLAW SPEC.. ADDED DD SPEC ADDED VLS AND STATIUS SPEC FTW!!! OWNER ONLY TO GET AND TRADE TO DONATORS (ALSO TO CHANGE USERNAME FOR OWNER BS ITS IN CLIENT.JAVA SEARCH "Z B0W D0WN Z" IN THERE AND CHANGE IT TO YOUR USER!!! WELL THANK YOU AND ENJOY THE SERVER![/center]
Source DL Link (UPPIT) - [url=http://uppit.com/v/3ZZHAFHV]http://uppit.com/v/3ZZHAFHV[/url]
[center]Well hope you enjoy and heres some pics...[/center]
[IMG]http://i29.tinypic.com/w6v9dk.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i32.tinypic.com/2e0ss2v.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i32.tinypic.com/bgskd0.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i31.tinypic.com/2rpy8w2.jpg[/img]
THANKS TO EVERYONE THAT PLAYED OVER THE SUMMER && IM HOPING YOULL BE PLAYING AGAIN NEXT SUMMER WHEN I HOST ONCE AGAIN!! LOVE YOU ALL AND HOPE YOU ENJOY!! ALSO IF U WANT TO CONTACT ME IN ANYWAY ADD MY MSN finger.on.the.trigger.never.again.4.me@hotmail.com FOR ANY PROBLEMS WITH SOURCE OR IF YOU JUST WANNA CHAT!! WELL ENJOY! ALSO I WOULD LIKE TO THANK ANYONE THAT COMPLIMENTED ME ON CODING AND EVERYTHING SO YEAH! THANKS TO ALL OF YOU THIS IS MY FINAL RELEASE UNTIL NEXT SUMMER!

item.title: Barrage KO 317 100% pvp second release
item.dc:creator: @xi_maul_ix xi maul ix
item.description:
@xi_maul_ix wrote:

[quote=“thebigpurpleglob, post:20, topic:299565”]First off, I bumped the real version of this no more then a day ago, and you leeched the pictures from it Its probally still on this same page…
Secound off, Dd Spec, Dragon Claw spec, Vesta spec, Statius spec were already added.
Third off, Your not supposed to release a source if you have less then 3% credits for editing somthing on the server and its not supposed to be on the same page as the other one.
I know you didn’t spend 2 weeks on this, this is just a feeble attempt to get rep++ when really all your doing is causing your self to be repp–'d.
Also, how are you even 15 rep?

PROOF OF LEECH, LOCK THIS.

[quote author=xi maul ix link=topic=426205.msg3246632#msg3246632 date=1277419678]
thanks for reposting I gonna use this
[/quote][/quote]

DD, Vesta, and Statius spec weren’t added when i downloaded the source, i revised a lot of the bonuses and added the real stat bonuses to the majority of the items but whatever if youre gonna sit here and say i leech, etc. go ahead. apparently youre just another angry flaming little kid. and if youre going to be numbering something off please learn how to spell “Second” and i have over 3% credits.

Read full topic

item.title: Barrage KO 317 100% pvp second release
item.dc:creator: @The_Secret_Team The Secret Team
item.description:
@The_Secret_Team wrote:

[quote=“cocoa, post:21, topic:299565”][quote author=xi maul ix link=topic=395881.msg2953996#msg2953996 date=1252717910]

roflmao? 2 weeks for that garbage?

it takes 2 seconds to change shops and 2 seconds to change interface text.
-10/10
rep-- if possible.

Don’t;
Leech and Release
gf motto.

okay -10 rep? lol irl? shit kid go code a source and anyways for 1 how the fuck u change the amount food will heal when u eat?? send me a priv message if u arent too fucking stupid to do that. and kid this isnt a “leech and release” this is a code and release and also if u dont FUCKING RECOGNIZE i took the time to post creds. also kid learn to fucking code before u go off bitching because people like me and others take our fucking time for failed FUCKING leechers like your FUCKING self.
[/quote]
there was no need for you to curse like that at him. He gave his opinion, which he was allowed to do. He may not have done it in such a way that appeals to you because obviously you’re only look for good comments which you aren’t/shouldn’t get with this type of server. (Sorry for the bias) However, I reported you nevertheless and I hope that you will keep yourself under control because there really is no need for you to lash out at people like you did.[/quote]
9/10

cough It does for him… It’s not that if something takes you 3 days someone else has to be done to right?
camelot pvp i posted above --^ so yeah i know i leeched alot of it but i added more specs and redid the spec gfx and emote on most 2h weps… i spent 2 weeks on coding it so yeah i couldve done better. also added the pvp points in the player control panel… -.- i take 100% credit for that small detail xD

it doesn’t take 2 weeks to program more specs, and “re-do” a spec gfx, and emote on the most 2h weapons.
[/quote] mmk well i also added a few items like vls and stat war hammer… soo uhhh… mind not being mean?.. lulz… it takes more than a few days to get it the way i wanted it… so yeah -.-[/quote]
